members.member: Static class to handle hashnames from everywhere

member.name: M:HoMMol_core.Crypto.HashNames.String2Id(System.String)
member.summary:
Get the hash number Id from a full path+filename
Adapted from WindSoul Game Engine source code
Function: unsigned long string_id(const char *str)
http://read.pudn.com/downloads76/sourcecode/game/281928/%E9%A3%8E%E9%AD%82/wdfpck.cpp__.htm String to convert into hash Id a 32 bits unique Id
